00021 /*! \file ColumnInfo.cpp This file defines column information class of various types.
00022  */
00023 
00024 #include "calvin_files/data/src/ColumnInfo.h"
00025 
00026 
00027 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00028 {
00029 
00030 /*! Constructor - used only by dervied types
00031  *      @param name_ Name of the column.
00032  *      @param type_ Type of data in the column.
00033  *      @param size_ Size of each element of in the column.
00034  *      @param len_ Number of elements of type in the column.
00035  *      @param overhead_ Number of extra bytes in the column
00036  */
00037 ColumnInfo::ColumnInfo(const std::wstring& name_, DataSetColumnTypes type_, int32_t size_, int32_t len_, int32_t overhead_) : name(name_), type(type_), size(size_), len(len_), overhead(overhead_){
00038 }
00039   
00040 /*! Constructor - used by the file read operation
00041  * @param name_ Name of the column.
00042  * @param type_ Type of data in the column.
00043  * @param totalSize Total size of the colum in bytes.
00044  */
00045 ColumnInfo::ColumnInfo(const std::wstring& name_, DataSetColumnTypes type_, int32_t totalSize)
00046     : name(name_), type(type_), size(totalSize), len(1), overhead(0)
00047 {
00048   if (type == ASCIICharColType || type == UnicodeCharColType) {
00049     overhead = 4;
00050     if (type == UnicodeCharColType) {
00051       size = sizeof(int16_t);
00052       len = (totalSize - overhead) / sizeof(int16_t);
00053     } else if (type == ASCIICharColType) {
00054       size = sizeof(int8_t);
00055       len = (totalSize - overhead) / sizeof(int8_t);
00056     }
00057   }
00058 }
00059 
00060 };
